column2: IN THE COURT OF APPEAL OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA
In  the  matter  of  an  appeal  under  and  in
terms  of  Section  331(1)  of  the  Code  of
Criminal Procedure Act No.15 of 1979 read
with  Article  138  of  the  Constitution  of  the
Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
